dict.acceptation: 打印机；印刷机；印刷商，印刷厂；印刷业从业人员，印花工；

sent.orig: Sends printer output to the default Windows printer or to a specific Windows printer.
sent.trans: 发送打印文档到系统默认打印机或指定的打印机。

sent.orig: Do not operate with the laser printer and the printer in pigment ink and CANNON printer.
sent.trans: 不要使用激光打印机和颜料墨的喷墨打印机操作。

sent.orig: A default printer is not specified. You must specify a default printer before printing.
sent.trans: 未指定默认打印机。打印前必须指定默认打印机。

sent.orig: It also can add the tape printer and finish the label printer at the same time.
sent.trans: 还可附加打印机，同步完成标签打印。

sent.orig: System automatically reminds and shifts to the other printer when kitchen printer is out of order.
sent.trans: 厨房打印机故障时，系统自动提醒报警以及转移打印输出位置。
